moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

moves.name: Lick
moves.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Spite
moves.description: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

moves.name: Mean Look
moves.description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

moves.name: Night Shade
moves.description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user's level.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

moves.name: Payback
moves.description: If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Dream Eater
moves.description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user's HP.

moves.name: Dark Pulse
moves.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.description: When this move is used, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.

moves.name: Hex
moves.description: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems.

moves.name: Nightmare
moves.description: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.
